mapper.select: SELECT ui.saved_file_name, u.user_id, u.user_name, ( SELECT sum(product_price) FROM product AS p INNER JOIN order_list AS ol ON ol.product_index=p.product_index where ol.user_id = u.login_id )as total_price FROM user_info AS u INNER JOIN user_image AS ui ON ui.user_id=u.login_id WHERE u.login_id=#{userId}
